design_philosophy.core_concept: Modern Diplomacy meets Future Tech. A dark, immersive experience that feels authoritative yet innovative. Avoids the beige/blue standard of UN sites.
rules: Text must be legible on dark backgrounds (WCAG AA).

headings.usage: All section titles, hero headers, committee names.

accents.usage: Dates, tags, technical details, decorative numbers.

grids.committees: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6 auto-rows-[300px]

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-black font-bold px-8 py-4 rounded-none hover:bg-white transition-colors duration-300 uppercase tracking-widest text-sm
buttons.secondary: border border-white/20 text-white px-8 py-4 rounded-none hover:bg-white/10 transition-colors duration-300 uppercase tracking-widest text-sm

cards.style: bg-surface border border-white/5 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300 p-8 relative overflow-hidden group
cards.hover_effect: Add a subtle glow or lift on hover. Do not use heavy drop shadows.

navigation.style: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-white/5

home.hero: Full height, abstract background with Tashkent landmark overlay. Big bold typography 'IHL MUN 2026'.

committees.layout: Bento grid. Each committee card has a unique abstract icon or subtle background image.
committees.content: 8 committees. Use 'conference_hall' image as page header background.

register.layout: Split screen. Left: 'delegates_group' image with overlay. Right: Shadcn Form.
register.form_style: Minimalist inputs, transparent background, bottom border only.

about.layout: Editorial style. Large typography. Team grid with 'delegates_group' style photos.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
